mapper.select: select count(*) from cardtbl where card_no=#{card_no}
select card_no from cardtbl where ano=#{ano}
mapper.insert: insert into cardtbl(card_no, password, ano, c_type, security_key, limit, limit_month) values(#{card_no}, #{password}, #{ano}, #{c_type}, #{security_key}, #{limit}, #{limit_month} )
